about_the_game:
Sweet New Year - 2025 is here (with a new AI model), here comes a simple and beautiful puzzle game with the theme of the New Year, with relaxing music accompaniment. After completing the level, you can enjoy the girl's photos in the gallery.

- The game has three difficulties

- Press the "F" key to open the black and white picture when solving the puzzle

- Players can press the 'blank' key during the game to complete the puzzle.

- Players can press the AD key, left and right keys or left and right mouse buttons in the gallery to quickly view the girl's pictures

* Image size 800x960 px

highlighted.name: It's going to be a long night

content_descriptors.notes:
-Nudity or sexual content
-Contains female masturbation content
-Clear depiction of female reproductive organs
-Not suitable for watching at work
-Not suitable for all ages
-All characters in the game are over 18 years old

name: Sweet New Year

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 32/64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
